channel.title: Fear of a Black Dragon - The Bandits of Bunglewood
channel.description:
In the latest episode of Fear of a Black Dragon, @Coalhada and I are talking about The Bandits of Bunglewood, an adventure found in Dungeon Magazine #51, originally published in 1995. In the Expert Delve segment, I talk about the changes I made to the module in order to make it more appealing to modern play groups.
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/fear-of-a-black-dragon/bandits-of-bunglewood
Thanks to @RichRogers for the editing of this episode!
